mapper.select: SELECT user_no, receiver_nm, shipto_addr1, shipto_addr2, receiver_tel, reg_dt, shipto_no, shipto_nm, upd_dt FROM tb_shipto_addr WHERE user_no = #{user_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_shipto_addr( user_no, receiver_nm, shipto_addr1, shipto_addr2, receiver_tel, reg_dt, shipto_no, shipto_nm, upd_dt ) VALUES ( #{user_no}, #{receiver_nm}, #{shipto_addr1}, #{shipto_addr2}, #{receiver_tel}, NOW(), #{shipto_no}, #{shipto_nm}, NOW() )
